DOC.brief_title: Trial Adjunctive Vitamin D Tuberculosis Treatment
DOC.criteria: Suspected smear positive pulmonary tuberculosis . Age 18 year old . Written inform consent participate . Known intolerance vitamin D firstline antituberculous therapy . Taking antituberculous therapy six day six month precede enrolment . Taking following medication month precede enrolment : oral corticosteroid therapy , immunosuppressant therapy cytotoxic therapy . Taking follow medication enrolment : benzothiadiazine derivative , cardiac glycoside antituberculous therapy rifampicin , isoniazid , pyrazinamide ethambutol . Diagnosis follow : sarcoidosis , hyperparathyroidism , nephrolithiasis , pulmonary silicosis , HIV infection , liver failure , renal failure malignancy Infection rifampicinresistant organism ( demonstrate rapid molecular test ) Biochemical disturbance enrolment : serum correct calcium > 2.66 mmol/l , serum AST > 120 IU/l , total serum bilirubin > 40 micromol/l serum creatinine > 250 micromol/l Breastfeeding pregnancy
